divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking at the beach when a huge saucer flew over camp penelton over thehorizon, it had huge patterns on the bottom resembling a flower and extremlybright lights of yellow, and orange toward the center and white lights groupedtogether on the ouside edges. When i first noticed it, i was looking at the sea,then it began to appear over the horizon. It must have been huge because i sawit from miles away, then it sped over me toward the north east. I never expectedto see this when i took a lazy walk on the beach.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
